CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(End_date__c),(Text(FLOOR(((YEAR(TODAY())-Value(RIGHT(Start_date__c,4)))* 12 + MONTH(TODAY()) - Value(LEFT( Start_date__c,2)))/12)) & " Years " &
Text(MOD((YEAR(TODAY())-Value(RIGHT(Start_date__c,4)))* 12 + MONTH(TODAY()) - Value(LEFT( Start_date__c,2)),12))& " Months "), (Text(FLOOR(((Value(RIGHT(End_date__c ,4))-Value(RIGHT(Start_date__c,4)))* 12 + Value(LEFT( End_date__c,2)) - Value(LEFT( Start_date__c,2)))/12)) & " Years " &
Text(MOD((Value(RIGHT(End_date__c ,4))-Value(RIGHT(Start_date__c,4)))* 12 + Value(LEFT( End_date__c,2)) - Value(LEFT( Start_date__c,2)),12))& " Months ") )
CustomField.label: Experience Formula
